track.strDescriptionEN:
"Feel It Still" is a song by American rock band Portugal. The Man. The song was written by the band along with John Hill and Asa Taccone, with the two latter serving as producers. It serves as the second single and first radio single off their eighth studio album Woodstock. The song peaked at number one on the Billboard Adult Alternative Songs chart, becoming the band's first to do so. Taking six weeks to do so, it is the fastest rise for an artist's first chart-topper on the chart since Mumford & Sons' "I Will Wait" took three weeks to reach number one. The song has also peaked at number one on the Billboard Alternative Songs chart, and is their first chart-topper on either chart. "Feel It Still" has also peaked at number 26 on the Billboard Hot 100, becoming their first entry on the chart.

The song has interpolations from The Marvelettes' track, "Please Mr. Postman". It was featured in advertisements for the Apple iPad Pro, Vitamin Water, and YouTube TV.
